params.name: image_processor
params.description: The image processor is a required input.

params.name: tokenizer
params.description: The tokenizer is a required input.

params.name: patch_size
params.description: Patch size from the vision tower.

params.name: spatial_merge_size
params.description: The downsampling factor for the spatial merge operation.

params.name: chat_template
params.description: A Jinja template which will be used to convert lists of messagesin a chat into a tokenizable string.

params.name: image_token
params.description: Special token used to denote image location.

params.name: image_break_token
params.description: Special token used to denote the end of a line of pixels in an image.

params.name: image_end_token
params.description: Special token used to denote the end of an image input.
